## Keto Weeknight Ground Beef Dinner in 30 Minutes

A quick, flavorful low-carb ground beef dish perfect for weeknights.

### Ingredients
- 1 pound (450 grams) ground beef (80% lean)
- 1 medium onion, diced (about 1/2 cup)
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup cauliflower rice (fresh or frozen)
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)
- 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese (optional, for topping)
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish, optional)

### Instructions
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat for 1 minute.
2. Add diced onion to the skillet; cook for 3-4 minutes until softened.
3. Add minced garlic; cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
4. Add ground beef; cook for 6-8 minutes, breaking it apart with a spatula, until browned and cooked through.
5. Drain excess fat if necessary; then stir in salt, pepper, smoked paprika, oregano, and red pepper flakes.
6. Push the beef mixture to one side of the skillet; add cauliflower rice to the cleared side.
7. Cook cauliflower rice for 4-5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender.
8. Mix the cauliflower rice into the beef mixture; cook for 1-2 more minutes to combine flavors.
9. If using, sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese on top; cover the skillet and cook for 1 minute until melted.
10. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired; serve hot.

### Notes
- To save time, use pre-packaged cauliflower rice.
- For variation, top with sliced avocado or sour cream before serving.
